meta.description: SIMPLIFIED ACCESSIBILITY RULES - Modify this file only. Rules are auto-generated to rules/ directory.
meta.instructions: Edit rules below, then run: npm run generate:rules

rules.title: WCAG: Alt Text for Images
rules.recommendation: Every image must have meaningful alt text. Alt text should describe the image purpose, not 'image' or 'photo'.

rules.title: WCAG: Keyboard Accessibility
rules.recommendation: All interactive elements must be accessible via keyboard. Use proper semantic HTML elements.

rules.title: WCAG: Focus Indicators
rules.recommendation: Interactive elements must have visible focus indicators. Don't remove outline without replacing it.

codeExample.bad: button { outline: none; } /* Removes focus indicator */

rules.title: WCAG: Heading Hierarchy
rules.recommendation: Use heading levels in proper order (h1, h2, h3...). Don't skip levels. Use only one h1 per page.

rules.title: WCAG: Form Labels
rules.recommendation: Every form input must have an associated label element.

rules.title: WCAG: Color Contrast (AA)
rules.recommendation: Text must have minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 (normal text) or 3:1 (large text).

rules.title: WCAG: Don't Use Color Alone
rules.recommendation: Don't rely on color alone to convey information. Use text, icons, or patterns too.

codeExample.bad: // Red icon = error, Green icon = success (no labels)
codeExample.good: // Red icon + 'Error' text, Green icon + 'Success' text

rules.title: WCAG: ARIA Labels
rules.recommendation: Use aria-label or aria-labelledby for elements without visible text.

rules.title: WCAG: Skip Navigation Link
rules.recommendation: Provide a skip link to jump over repetitive content (like navigation).

codeExample.bad: // No way to skip to main content

rules.title: WCAG: Landmark Regions
rules.recommendation: Use semantic HTML landmarks: main, nav, header, footer, aside, section.

rules.title: WCAG: Form Error Messages
rules.recommendation: Provide clear, linked error messages that identify the problematic field.

codeExample.good: // Red border + error message linked to input

rules.title: WCAG: Resizable Text
rules.recommendation: Don't disable text resizing. Ensure layout works at 200% zoom.

rules.title: WCAG: Link Purpose
rules.recommendation: Link text must describe its purpose. Avoid 'Click here' or 'More'.

rules.title: WCAG: Form Autocomplete
rules.recommendation: Use proper autocomplete attributes on form fields for accessibility and UX.

rules.title: WCAG: Modal Focus Management
rules.recommendation: When a modal opens, focus must move to it. Trap focus within modal. Return focus when closed.

codeExample.bad: // Modal opens but focus stays on background
codeExample.good: // useEffect(() => modalRef.focus()) on mount, trap focus inside

rules.title: WCAG: Video Captions
rules.recommendation: Provide captions for all video content. Provide transcripts for audio content.

rules.title: WCAG: Reduce Motion
rules.recommendation: Respect prefers-reduced-motion media query for users with vestibular disorders.

rules.title: WCAG: No Time Limits
rules.recommendation: Don't use time limits for user interactions. If necessary, allow users to extend them.

codeExample.bad: // Session expires after 5 minutes with no warning
codeExample.good: // Show warning with option to extend session

rules.title: WCAG: Page Language
rules.recommendation: Specify page language in HTML. Mark content in other languages.

rules.title: WCAG: Error Prevention & Recovery
rules.recommendation: Provide error prevention (confirmation for important actions) and recovery methods.
